actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide that the blend of 50 percent regional and 50 percent national prospective payment rates shall be permanent.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide that the DRG prospective payment rate, following the phase in period, shall be a 50-50 blend of the appropriate regional and national rate.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide that the blend of 50 percent regional and 50 percent national prospective payment rates shall be permanent.
